Portia Zvavahera (a mụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe.

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na BAT Visual Arts Studio na National Gallery of Zimbabwe site n'afọ 2003 ruo 2005 wee nweta diplọma na nka nlereanya site na Harare Polytechnic na 2006, ebe onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Zimbabwe bụ Chiko Chazunguza kụziiri ya. Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-etinye ihe ndị e biri ebi site na iji ink na-ebi akwụkwọ na mmanụ.

N'afọ 2009, Zvavahera bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi na Greatmore Studios na Cape Town, South Africa. Zvavahera nọchitere anya Zimbabwe na 55th Venice Biennale n'afọ 2013 dị ka akụkụ nke ngosi Dudziro: Ajụjụ ọhụụ nke nkwenkwe okpukpe. Ọ sonyeere Stevenson, South Africa, na 2013. Na mbụ, Zvavahera gosipụtara ọrụ ya na National Gallery nke Zimbabwe na Gallery Delta.

O meriri South Africa's Tollman Award maka nka nlereanya n'afọ 2013 nak2a South Africa'n FNB (First National Bank) Art Prize na 2014. N'afọ 2017, Zvavahera sonyere na obibi ọnwa atọ na Gasworks na London, United Kingdom, nke Institute of Contemporary Art Indian Ocean (ICAIO) kwadoro.
